name: atlassian-confluence-server
label: Atlassian Confluence Server
description: Atlassian Confluence is a team workspace where knowledge and collaboration meet. Create, collaborate, and organize all your work in one place.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: URL of the Atlassian Confluence Server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Username
fields.description: Username to access the Atlassian Confluence Server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: username

fields.title: Password
fields.description: Password to access the Atlassian Confluence Server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: password

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description:
Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. 
By default, this option is set to True.

operations.title: Get Spaces List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all spaces from Atlassian Confluence Server based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Type
parameters.name: type
parameters.tooltip: Select the type to filter the list of spaces returned. You can choose from following options: global or personal.
parameters.description: Select the type to filter the list of spaces returned. You can choose from following options: global or personal.

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.tooltip: Select the status to filter the list of spaces returned. You can choose from following options: current or archived.
parameters.description: Select the status to filter the list of spaces returned. You can choose from following options: current or archived.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of items that this operation should return. Default: "25".
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of items that this operation should return. Default: "25".

operations.title: Create Space
operations.description: Creates a new Space in Atlassian Confluence Server.

parameters.title: Key
parameters.name: key
parameters.tooltip: Specify the key of the new space that you want to create in Atlassian Confluence Server.
parameters.description: Specify the key of the new space that you want to create in Atlassian Confluence Server.

parameters.title: Name
parameters.name: name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the new space that you want to create in Atlassian Confluence Server.
parameters.description: Specify the name of the new space that you want to create in Atlassian Confluence Server.

parameters.title: Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.tooltip: Specify the description of the new space that you want to create in Atlassian Confluence Server.
parameters.description: Specify the description of the new space that you want to create in Atlassian Confluence Server.

operations.title: Get Content List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of content from Atlassian Confluence Server based on the space key, page title and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Space Key
parameters.name: spaceKey
parameters.tooltip: Specify the space key from which you want to retrieve the content.
parameters.description: Specify the space key from which you want to retrieve the content.

parameters.title: Page Title
parameters.name: title
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page title to retrieve from Atlassian Confluence Server.
parameters.description: Specify the page title to retrieve from Atlassian Confluence Server.

parameters.title: Properties to Expand
parameters.name: expand
parameters.tooltip: Specify a comma separated list of properties to expand on the content. e.g. history,space,version.
parameters.description: Specify a comma separated list of properties to expand on the content. e.g. history,space,version.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of items that this operation should return. Default: "25".
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of items that this operation should return. Default: "25".

operations.title: Create Content
operations.description: Creates a new piece of content in Atlassian Confluence Server.

parameters.title: Content Type
parameters.name: type
parameters.tooltip: Specify the content type that you want to create in Atlassian Confluence Server. e.g. page or blogpost.
parameters.description: Specify the content type that you want to create in Atlassian Confluence Server. e.g. page or blogpost.

parameters.title: Space Key
parameters.name: space
parameters.tooltip: Specify the space key on which to create the content.
parameters.description: Specify the space key on which to create the content.

parameters.title: Title
parameters.name: title
parameters.tooltip: Specify the title of the new content that you want to create in Atlassian Confluence Server.
parameters.description: Specify the title of the new content that you want to create in Atlassian Confluence Server.

parameters.title: Body
parameters.name: body
parameters.tooltip: Specify the body of the new content that you want to create in Atlassian Confluence Server.
parameters.description: Specify the body of the new content that you want to create in Atlassian Confluence Server.

operations.title: Update Content
operations.description: Updates the content in Atlassian Confluence Server.

parameters.title: Content ID
parameters.name: contentId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the content ID that you want to update in Atlassian Confluence Server.
parameters.description: Specify the content ID that you want to update in Atlassian Confluence Server.

parameters.title: Version Number
parameters.name: version
parameters.tooltip: Specify the new version number for the content that you want to update in Atlassian Confluence Server. Note: To update a piece of content you must increment the version number, supplying the number of the version you are creating.
parameters.description: Specify the new version number for the content that you want to update in Atlassian Confluence Server. Note: To update a piece of content you must increment the version number, supplying the number of the version you are creating.

parameters.title: Content Type
parameters.name: type
parameters.tooltip: Specify the type of the content that you want to update in Atlassian Confluence Server. e.g. page or blogpost.
parameters.description: Specify the type of the content that you want to update in Atlassian Confluence Server. e.g. page or blogpost.

parameters.title: Space Key
parameters.name: space
parameters.tooltip: Specify the space key on which to update the content.
parameters.description: Specify the space key on which to update the content.

parameters.title: Title
parameters.name: title
parameters.tooltip: Specify the title of the content that you want to update in Atlassian Confluence Server.
parameters.description: Specify the title of the content that you want to update in Atlassian Confluence Server.

parameters.title: Body
parameters.name: body
parameters.tooltip: Specify the body of the content that you want to update in Atlassian Confluence Server.
parameters.description: Specify the body of the content that you want to update in Atlassian Confluence Server.

operations.title: Delete Content
operations.description: Deletes the content from Atlassian Confluence Server.

parameters.title: Content ID
parameters.name: contentId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the content ID that you want to delete from Atlassian Confluence Server.
parameters.description: Specify the content ID that you want to delete from Atlassian Confluence Server.

operations.title: Get Content List Using CQL
operations.description: Retrieves a list of content from Atlassian Confluence Server based on the Confluence Query Language (CQL). For reference: https://developer.atlassian.com/server/confluence/advanced-searching-using-cql

parameters.title: CQL
parameters.name: cql
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Confluence Query Language (CQL) based on which to retrieve the content.
parameters.description: Specify the Confluence Query Language (CQL) based on which to retrieve the content.

parameters.title: CQL Context
parameters.name: cqlcontext
parameters.tooltip: Specify the context to execute a cql search in, this is the json serialized form of SearchContext.
parameters.description: Specify the context to execute a cql search in, this is the json serialized form of SearchContext.

parameters.title: Properties to Expand
parameters.name: expand
parameters.tooltip: Specify a comma separated list of properties to expand on the content. e.g. history,space,version.
parameters.description: Specify a comma separated list of properties to expand on the content. e.g. history,space,version.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of items that this operation should return. Default: "25".
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of items that this operation should return. Default: "25".
